title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonicsb. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for super class), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeNamef. The label could say 'Select destination type:'g. Browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes)c. Title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'. Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.e. The destination type can be source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
OB:
The browse button size is inadequate.
When navigating to the next page, the 'Type not found' message is displayed in the title.
The dialog displays types from folders that are not part of the current project.
Attempting to select the source type as the destination type triggers a warning about resulting errors and introduces pseudo changes in referencing classes.
